Examples#

from pybioportal import mutations as mts

df1 = mts.get_muts_in_mol_prof_by_sample_list_id(molecular_profile_id="brca_tcga_mutations",
                                                 sample_list_id="brca_tcga_all",
                                                 entrez_gene_id="672")
